description: Jot It - Tap, Tap, Type, Swipe. The fastest memo app for WebOS. ***Featured on Palm's Developer Blog, "Jot It is a great substitute for the standard Memo app and it’s super fast to boot." - webOSroundup*** This gorgeous app runs minimized on your device, always ready to remember your latest notes, ideas, thoughts and errands. | Jot It features full customization of up to five categories including: name, font color and category color with support for hex codes! | Optional AutoEmail feature sends a copy of a new note to an email upon completion. | Jot It automatically saves, so you never lose anything. | Simply type to search through all your notes. | Start jotting today! | **** Updates **** | Ver1.0.5 removes splash screen and adds an update checker. Ver1.0.4 Adds a togglable formatting toolbar via gesture swipe and a Send Email & Delete feature for quick one time notes. Ver1.0.2 Allows longer category names and AutoEmail on Edit Note and fixes a bug where long notes could not be read all the way.
